config_files..github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/bug_report.yml:
name: Bug Report
description: Report a bug in LLuminary
title: "[Bug]: "
labels: ["bug", "triage"]
body:
  - type: markdown
    attributes:
      value: |
        Thanks for taking the time to fill out this bug report!
  - type: input
    id: version
    attributes:
      label: LLuminary Version
      description: What version of LLuminary are you using?
      placeholder: "0.5.0"
    validations:
      required: true
  - type: dropdown
    id: provider
    attributes:
      label: LLM Provider
      description: Which provider is affected by this issue?
      options:
        - OpenAI
        - Anthropic
        - Google
        - Bedrock
        - Cohere
        - All/Multiple
    validations:
      required: true
  - type: textarea
    id: description
    attributes:
      label: Description
      description: A clear description of the bug
      placeholder: What happened? What did you expect to happen?
    validations:
      required: true
  - type: textarea
    id: reproduction
    attributes:
      label: Reproduction Steps
      description: Steps to reproduce the behavior
      placeholder: |
        1. Initialize client with '...'
        2. Call method '...'
        3. See error
    validations:
      required: true
  - type: textarea
    id: logs
    attributes:
      label: Relevant Logs
      description: Please copy and paste any relevant logs
      render: shell
